id.regexText: ID should begin with an alphabet and contain only alphabets and digits.
id.name: ./id

listeners.selectionchanged: function(me, val, isChecked) { var panel = me.findParentByType('panel'); var tagsField1 = panel.getComponent('fieldset1'); var tagsField2 = panel.getComponent('fieldset2'); if (val === 'Badges_Petals') { tagsField1.show();tagsField1.enable(); for(var i =9;i < 11;i++) {tagsField2.getComponent('tagsField' + i).setValue(false); } tagsField2.disable(); } else if (val === 'Journey') {tagsField2.show();tagsField2.enable(); for(var i =0;i < 9;i++) {tagsField1.getComponent('tagsField' + i).setValue(false); } tagsField1.disable(); } else { for(var i =0;i < 9;i++) {tagsField1.getComponent('tagsField' + i).setValue(false); } for(var i =9;i < 11;i++) {tagsField2.getComponent('tagsField' + i).setValue(false); } tagsField1.disable();tagsField2.disable(); }}

function(me, val, isChecked) { var panel = me.findParentByType('panel').findParentByType('panel'); var catTagsField = panel.getComponent('catTags'); var curVal = catTagsField.getValue(); if (isChecked) {catTagsField.setValue(curVal + 'Citizenship,'); } else { catTagsField.setValue(curVal.replace(/Citizenship,/g,'')); } }
